list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move or cause to move in a specified direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he passed through towns and villages
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh đi qua các thị trấn và làng mạc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: go past or across; leave behind or on one side in proceeding.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the two vehicles had no room to pass each other
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hai phương tiện không có chỗ để vượt qua nhau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of time or a point in time) elapse; go by.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the day and night passed slowly
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ngày và đêm trôi qua chậm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: transfer (something) to someone, especially by handing or bequeathing it to the next person in a series.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: your letter has been passed to Mr. Rich for action
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thư của bạn đã được truyền cho ông Rich cho hành động

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a candidate) be successful in (an examination, test, or course).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã vượt qua bài kiểm tra lái xe của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a legislative or other official body) approve or put into effect (a proposal or law) by voting on it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the bill was passed despite fierce opposition
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dự luật đã được thông qua bất chấp sự phản đối khốc liệt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pronounce (a judgment or judicial sentence).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: passing judgment on these crucial issues
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: vượt qua sự phán xét về những vấn đề quan trọng này

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: discharge (something, especially urine or feces) from the body.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tần suất đi tiểu xuyên qua

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: forgo one's turn in a game or an offered opportunity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we pass on dessert and have coffee
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đi qua món tráng miệng và uống cà phê

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act or instance of moving past or through something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: repeated passes with the swipe card
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: lặp đi lặp lại với thẻ quẹt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a successful completion of an examination or course.
a card, ticket, or permit giving authorization for the holder to enter or have access to a place, form of transportation, or event.
(in football, soccer, hockey, and other games) an act of throwing, kicking, or hitting the ball or puck to another player on the same team.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cánh đồng chéo của anh ấy đến Giggs

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an amorous or sexual advance made to someone.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she made a pass at Stephen
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã đi qua tại Stephen

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a state or situation of a specified, usually bad or difficult, nature.
an act of refraining from bidding during the auction.
a route over or through mountains.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the pass over the mountain was open again after the snows
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đường chuyền trên núi đã mở một lần nữa sau khi tuyết rơi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: said when one does not know the answer to a question, for example in a quizzing game.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: to the enigmatic question we answered “Pass.”
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cho câu hỏi bí ẩn mà chúng tôi đã trả lời "Pass".

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: passenger.
passim.
passive.
